title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Drops 4.7% Over Weekend as All Assets Decline
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Avalanche (AVAX) fell 8.6% and Uniswap (UNI) declined 8.5%, leading the index lower.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3068.55, down 4.7% (-151.33) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

None of the twenty assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BTC (-1.2%) and XRP (-4.5%)

Laggards: AVAX (-8.6%) and UNI (-8.5%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports that the CoinDesk 20 Index dropped 4.7% with all twenty assets declining, indicating widespread market losses.
